name: Arch Linux 32
description: The community maintained continuation of 32-bit support for Arch Linux.

name: Arch Linux ARM
description: A distribution of Linux for ARM computers.

name: PacBSD
description: A lightweight and flexible BSD distribution that provides a base system for use of Pacman package manager.

name: Arch Hurd
description: A derivative work of Arch Linux porting it to the GNU Hurd system with packages optimised for the i686 architecture.

name: ArchWSL
description: ArchLinux as a WSL Instance.

name: Manjaro
description: A professionally made Linux based operating system that is a suitable replacement for Windows or macOS.

name: ArcoLinux
description: A full-featured distribution.

name: ArchBang Linux
description: A lightweight distribution based on Arch Linux.

name: Archman
description: An Arch Linux-based distribution which features the Calamares system installer and a pre-configured desktop environment.

name: Bluestar Linux
description: A GNU/Linux distribution that is based on Arch Linux.

name: EndeavourOS
description: A rolling release Linux distribution based on Arch Linux.

name: ArchLabs Linux
description: A distribution based on Arch Linux and featuring the Openbox window manager as the primary desktop interface.

name: Chakra GNU/Linux
description: A user-friendly and powerful distribution and live CD originally forked from Arch Linux.

name: Namib GNU/Linux
description: A desktop operating system based on (and compatible with) the Arch Linux distribution.

name: ArchEX
description: A new (190612) Linux live DVD based on Arch Linux. Arch motto is KISS (Keep It Simple Stupid.

name: Arch XFerience
description: A modern OS based on Arch Linux, built for day-to-day operations with tons of packages & features.

name: Ctlos Linux
description: Arch Linux based distro.

name: MagpieOS
description: Get a fresh experience of Arch.

name: Netrunner Rolling
description: Manjaro/Arch Linux based distro.

name: PuppyRus-A
description: Lightweight, portable and flexible Linux based on Arch, Puppy, Porteus.

name: TeLiSc OS
description: A simple GNU/Linux distribution based on Arch Linux which provides you a stable Arch Linux with i3 window manager.

name: BlackArch Linux
description: (Security/Forensics) - An Arch Linux-based distribution designed for penetration testers and security researchers.

name: ArchStrike
description: (Security) - A distribution for security professionals and researchers based on Arch Linux.

name: SystemRescueCd
description: (Data Rescue) - An Arch-based Linux system on a bootable CD-ROM or USB drive, designed for repairing a system and data after a crash.

name: MorpheusArch Linux
description: (Data Rescue) - A distribution based on Arch Linux.

name: LinHES
description: (MythTV) - An attempt to make the installation of GNU/Linux and MythTV as trivial as possible.

name: UBOS
description: (Server) - A Linux distribution designed to greatly reduce the amount of time required to set up and maintain common network services.

name: TalkingArch
description: (Assistive) - A re-spin of the Arch Linux live ISO image, modified to include speech and Braille output for blind and visually-impaired users.

name: Archphile
description: (Raspberry Pi/ARM/Audio) - Yet another linux audio distribution for embedded boards.

name: BBQLinux
description: (Android Developers) - A user-friendly Linux distribution made for Android developers.

name: RaspArch
description: (Raspberry Pi/ARM) - A “remaster” of Arch Linux ARM.

name: Obarun
description: An Arch Linux based distribution featuring the S6 init software in place of systemd.

name: Artix Linux
description: A fork (or continuation as an autonomous project) of the Arch-OpenRC and Manjaro-OpenRC projects.

name: Hyperbola GNU/Linux-libre
description: A community driven effort to provide a fully free (as in freedom) operating system that is stable, secure, simple, lightweight that tries to Keep It Simple Stupid (KISS) with Long Term Support (LTS).

name: Parabola GNU/Linux-libre
description: An unofficial "libre" variant of Arch Linux.

name: Alfheim Linux
description: Systemd free Arch based Linux.

name: Anarchy Linux
description: A simple and intuitive Arch Linux installer.

name: Termux Arch
description: Run Arch Linux ARM on your mobile phone with Termux.
